Brazil: Portuguese missionaries José de Anchieta and Manuel da Nóbrega establish São Paulo, then named São Paulo dos Campos de Piratininga, in southeast Brazil.
China: The Luso-Chinese agreement (1554) for Macau is made between the Kingdom of Portugal and the Ming dynasty.
Germany: Moritzbastei was constructed as a bastion.
Spain: English Queen Mary I of England married Spanish Prince Philip.
Sweden: Border skirmishes between Sweden and Russia lead to outbreak of Russo-Swedish War (1554-1557)
